---
title: "`endpoints` Action"
---

This `endpoints` action returns the Arrow Flight endpoints for a flight descriptor. By using the action it is possible to pass along the query predicate information to the server.

## Input Parameters

There is a single `msgpack` serialized parameter passed to the action.

```c++
struct AirportEndpointParameters
{
  std::string json_filters;
  std::vector<idx_t> column_ids;

  // The parameters to the table function, which should
  // be included in the opaque ticket data returned
  // for each endpoint.
  std::string table_function_parameters;
  std::string table_function_input_schema;

  MSGPACK_DEFINE_MAP(json_filters, column_ids, table_function_parameters, table_function_input_schema)
};

struct AirportGetFlightEndpointsRequest
{
  std::string descriptor;
  AirportEndpointParameters parameters;

  MSGPACK_DEFINE_MAP(descriptor, parameters)
};

```

## Output Results

The `endpoints` action is expected to return a single `msgpack` encoded result which is a `vector<std::string>` of serialized `FlightEndpoint` structures.
